verses.verse: Now when all this was finished<WH3615>, all Israel<WH3478> that were present<WH4672> went out<WH3318> to the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and brake<WH7665> in pieces<WH7665> the pillars<WH4676>, and hewed down<WH1438> the Asherim<WH842>, and brake down<WH5422> the high places<WH1116> and the altars<WH4196> out of all Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin<WH1144>, in Ephraim<WH669> also and Manasseh<WH4519>, until they had destroyed<WH3615> them all<WH1121>.
